BrightBlade looked over at Rampage as Gangon had then run away, actually 
surprised that he had come back but then looking back towards Rampage.
She saw a slight look in his optics that indicated that he might want to 
chase after him and destroy him, she put up a hand just incase the look was 
true.

" If you really want to do something for me then you can track Gangon down 
and bring him to me. But only if you are not needed by Hell Beast. If you 
are needed then forget about him, there are other things to do."

She then turned towards the Maximal base, waiting for more info from Hell 
Beast and wondering if Rampage was going to obey her or not.
If he was instructed to stay there then that was fine with her but if he was 
not then it would be nice if he brought Gangon to her.
She spoke without looking at him.

" But I would like him returned to me without damage if that is passable, 
tell him that I have requested him to me and he may come on his 
own...please."
